resources.string:
This application is developed for simple implementation of Firebase Remote Config. 

In this tab, you can find short description about the app, link of source code and Medium Story, and my web site. On second tab, default values is shown, and on last tab, you can see the values which is set according to your segmentation. 

With float action button, you can fetch the values.

This value changes according to device language, and can be nine different values with default value. You can change fetched value with changing your device language. Supported languages are: English(en), Turkish(tr), German(de), Spanish(es), Russian(ru), Italian(it), Serbian(sr), Estonian(et).
This value changes according to what your randomly percentile is within the users, and can be eleven different values with default value. Randomly selection is divided with 10% of the all users.
You are within default segment of users. (default-xml)

This value changes according to your selected choice via User Property value of Google Analytics for Firebase. When you select any option, your user property value is updated. According to this value, on Fetched Tab, you can see new color after you fetch values with FAB.
